original_text: Those people will seem to be serving God. But really they refuse to accept God's power to help them. You must stay away from people like that.
korean_text: 경건의 모양은 있으나 경건의 능력은 부인하니 이같은 자들에게서 네가 돌아서라

sentences.original_text: Those people will seem to be serving God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 하나님을 섬기는 것처럼 보일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But really they refuse to accept God's power
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 실제로 그들은 하나님의 권능을 받아들이기를 거절합니다

sentences.original_text: You must stay away from people like that
